title: Concealed Refuge
description: Allie’s life comes to a sudden halt when both her parents die from a mysterious illness. However, Allie is no ordinary girl and over a century later her physical body hasn’t appeared to age. But time has taken its toll, and with all her friends long dead, she’s grown into an isolating reality where she is miserable and living alone.In one incredible moment, her mind-numbing existence becomes a thing of the past when she is literally whisked off to a new world. The reason for her longevity is only the tip of the iceberg, when the truth about her life unfolds.Out Of Print
author: J Husted
